mapper.sql: ID, task_id, event_type, identity_id, event_at, event_content, rec_update_time
mapper.select: SELECT te.*, o.`name` AS node_name, o.identity_id AS node_identityId, o.carrier_node_id AS node_id FROM task_event AS te LEFT JOIN task_org AS o ON te.identity_id = o.identity_id where te.task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into task_event (ID, task_id, event_type, identity_id, event_at, event_content, rec_update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert ignore into task_event (task_id, event_type, identity_id, event_at, event_content) values
(#{item.taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.eventAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.eventContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into task_event
ID,
task_id,
event_type,
identity_id,
event_at,
event_content,
rec_update_time,

#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update task_event
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
event_type = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity_id = #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
event_at = #{eventAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
event_content = #{eventContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rec_update_time = #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update task_event set task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_type = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_id = #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_at = #{eventAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, event_content = #{eventContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_update_time = #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
